TopicTitle: ZoPL "Kiwi"- Duna Capable SSTO by Zokesia Skunkworks!

Articles.Content:
Great for parties! One man, LDO possible. RCS, Glides easy. Slightly tail heavy on landing. Remember to put all fuel foreward for landing.... and FOR KERBS SAKE KEEP SAS ON!

Next version (will be updated in 2 days) will have docking ports.

Download.

"2" for Jets

"3" for Aerospikes

"4" for NERVA (Long range)

Edited June 6, 2013 by zekes

New Mk III with docing port and Ladders and solar panels!

http://www./?p5ib4rxdr2rd3bm
Anyone? this is a very impressive ship. It deserves attention.
Add a cargo bay and doors to it add you'll get lots of attention.
To be honest, as of right now there's nothing setting it apart from the rest of the spaceplane market. It's cool looking, but that's the extent of the impressiveness.
yeah i guess you are right, i just hoped more people would like it.
I'm sure people like it. I like how it looks.
i dunno, it was my first ever Duna-return capable SSTO, back in 17.0, and I redid it for 0.21 and I still love it.
Hey zekes Mediafire is screwed so i might upload my Sub tommorow. D:

Hey zekes Mediafire is screwed so i might upload my Sub tommorow. D:

That is why I use Dropbox

Anyway cool SSTO, I just hate when good ships in the spacecraft exchange get pushed back by cr*p and lots of cr*p.

I can only get my SSTO. To orbit and down, that's it.

I tried flying it, but i'm quite a noob at it and i don'T have the knowledge of what a good climbing curve should be.

The whole thing backflipped when i turned on the aerospikes...

Hmm nice looking craft.

Does it need to be refuled to get to Duna?

Hmm nice looking craft.

Does it need to be refuled to get to Duna?

If you fly it to Low Duna orbit and aerobrake, then yes. If you want to land on the surface, you have to refuel the Nuke on the surface and after it attains orbit again.
Looks pretty good, always love your desgins...
